1.name: - Douglas
1.title: Excellent tutor
1.body: James is an excellent tutor who is very knowledgeable, patient, and encouraging! He has helped with algebra, precalculus, and calculus. I highly recommend him! I have learned about exponent rules, systems of equations, graphing functions, transformations, derivatives, power rule, and chain rule. He explains things very well, and has a lot of understanding/patience. He offers excellent tools and guidance as well as encouragement when you feel doubtful about your learning journey. If you need support on your math journey, do yourself a favor and get James in your corner. You won't regret it.

2.name: - Tyler
2.title: Very patient
2.body: He was great now I just need my son to follow up. He was smart and patient. Really knows his math. Exceptionally willing to do whatever works. And made it clear and straightforward

3.name: - Mason
3.title: Very Kind and Patient
3.body: James was very kind and patient with me and helped me a ton! James was able to help me get through my SQL assignment that i had been struggling with.

4.name: - Morgan
4.title: Knowledgeable, patient, and readily available!!
4.body: James has been working with my son on PreCalc and has helped him to realize his potential!! James is a great tutor, and ready at short notice, communicates well. Would highly recommend!!

5.name: - Vanessa
5.title: Wise and professional
5.body: Excellent teacher very good at explaining how things work. Knows the python language well. He is definitely a knowledgeable tutoring expert.
